channel.title: shraddhan on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in shraddhan on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Shraddhan
item.description:
20:17 Monday 22 October 2018 JST 飯田橋駅でShraddhanさんと遊びと会いました。ローソンで彼が作った５７と 言うゲームをやって見ました。
それで、お金で遊ぶゲームもやって見ました。お金で遊ぶと安心でリラックスす るとお金のエネルギーは新しいプロジェクトのため集まります。

item.title: cCCC with Shraddhan
item.description: 20:00 Monday 22 October 2018 JST I met Shraddhan in Iidabashi to hear about his Creative Capitalism game. I don’t have a full sense of how to play it, but we had fun playing a small version which resulted in six piles of 72 yen each, plus a 5 yen coin in the center. The idea is that these will be seed money for six different projects.
